definition: The term refers to the characteristic color of a person's skin, typically used to describe the shade or tone of someone's complexion. It is commonly employed in discussions related to diversity, race, or when describing physical appearances.

examples.german: Die Hautfarbe der Menschen variiert je nach Ethnie.
examples.english: The skin color of people varies depending on their ethnicity.

examples.german: Die Hautfarbe wird durch das Pigment Melanin bestimmt.
examples.english: Skin color is determined by the pigment melanin.

examples.german: Die Hautfarbe kann sich durch Sonneneinstrahlung verändern.
examples.english: Skin color can change due to sun exposure.

examples.german: Die Hautfarbe spielt in vielen Kulturen eine Rolle bei der sozialen Identität.
examples.english: Skin color plays a role in the social identity of many cultures.
